div.p: Contessa Pelfrey is inviting you to a scheduled Zoom meeting.

Topic: 4/15/20 JSD Special Meeting
Time: Apr 15, 2020 05:30 PM Pacific Time (US and Canada)

Dial by your location
+1 720 707 2699 US (Denver)
+1 346 248 7799 US (Houston)
+1 646 558 8656 US (New York)
+1 253 215 8782 US
+1 301 715 8592 US
+1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago)
Meeting ID: 825 458 7317
Password: 359970
Find your local number: https://us04web.zoom.us/u/f7tWFgmun

div.p:
September 9, 2020 @ 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm
Chinese Camp Science Academy
Jamestown School District offers a healthy, safe, enriching, learning environment to help each child grow and achieve.
